title: Part Time liaison
body:
> by 0x7a5e56c9fb159fe942c724d929016313628e5661 (NonFungibleDude)

Should the following Tier 1: up to $1,500 USD in MANA, one-time payment grant in the Community category be approved?

## Abstract

We must retain these new users!

The amount of questions I have answered in genesis plaza has been staggering. As such, I feel we need a person there to help! I have also witnessed appalling behavior over the last few days, I was able to assist folks in all reporting violent racist rhetoric. We do not need folks to spawn in for the first time and see that.

For this proposal, I believe one week's time would be the best for all parties. We can re-evaluate after that time period. I would assist folks for at least 4 hours a day, every day.

NonFungibleDude


## Grant size

325 USD

## Beneficiary address

0x7a5e56c9fb159FE942C724d929016313628e5661

## Description

I am a certified digital marketer, monetized content creator, DCL landowner, and in my past life a tenured sales manager. I'm sure many of you have seen me around and hopefully noticed that I always do my best to be welcoming and assist new folks with any questions (NonFungibleDude). This would be a dream come true for me to have a chance to assist DCL in an official capacity while getting to know the community!

The idea that you show up and a real person is there to help you will set this experience even further apart from other gaming experiences folks will have had!

\#LastSliceGang


## Specification

At minimum 28 hours of my time over seven days being helpful and upbeat while making sure everyone has a good first impression of DCL.

I have already spent at least 4 hours in genesis plaza over the last three days helping folks out!


## Personnel

I will be the only person working on this project. I most likely at least casually know many of you so I can always introduce folks who may need professional assistance to folks who can assist them!
NonFungibleGuy one page slide-
file:///C:/Users/NIck%20work%20rig/Desktop/NFD%20Intro%20Slide.pdf

LinkedIn-
https://www.linkedin.com/in/nick-knutson/


## Roadmap and milestones

One week while new users are really flowing in. Re-evaluate needs at that time.

Thank you for your consideration.
NonFungibleDude
\#slicegang

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=8a36d4d0-3adf-11ec-be0c-afec86cba5e5)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
